version_description: •Bug fixes and feature improvements.
•Bug fixes and feature improvements
•Bug fixes
•Bug fixes

* Improved Gateway activation messaging
* Improved error messaging
* Bug fixes

* Gateway activation improvements
* Bug fixes

* Gateway activation enhancements
* Miscellaneous defect fixes
* Miscellaneous defect fixes

We’ve said goodbye to Halloween pumpkins and some of the peskier bugs slowing down the xFi app. Here are the latest updates designed to enhance your overall experience and your connected life in general. Sorry, we can’t help with the leftover candy corn.

Life gets hectic this time of year, so we’re delivering a few updates to make things easier. No gift wrap needed! Here’s what’s new:

* More efficient activation. It’s just a few steps to get going with a new Gateway and to connect all your devi

Here are the latest updates to help you manage your connected home:

* Clearer communications around service issues with more direct ways to resolve.
* Improved layout and a better overall experience for iPhone X users.

We’ve made a few updates to improve the app and your xFi experience all around. Here’s what’s new:

* A dedicated ‘Network’ tab where you can manage advanced settings, check your Gateway and network devices. Find it on the navigation bar at the

We’ve made a few updates to improve the app and your xFi experience all around. Here’s what’s new:
• Push notifications! Get alerts about your home network sent right to your smartphone, and always be in the know even when you’re on the go.
• Bug fi
Stay tuned for new features and enhancements coming soon. In the meantime, we've swept a few bugs to improve overall performance.

In the spirit of Spring, we’ve cleaned out a few bugs and planted some seeds for new ideas to come. Stay tuned!

• xFi Pods are now available in all markets. Go to https://xfinity.com/xfipods for details.
• Thanks to your feedback, w
Stay tuned for new features and enhancements coming soon. In the meantime, we’ve swept for bugs to make your experience even better. Thanks for your feedback!​

We’ve been working behind the scenes to improve overall performance and minimize sun damage. Just kidding. Wear sunscreen! Here’s what you can expect with this release: ​
Less lag time. We’ve cut launch and load times for a more responsive experience.<

Enjoy the last of summer with some seasonal updates and a vanilla cone to go. Sprinkles optional.

• See what’s new in xFi when you first sign in. We’ll highlight new features when they’re released.

Apple cider, pumpkin spice, and the smell of updates are in the air. Here’s what’s new:​

• If you’re using a different name and password for your 2.4 and 5.0 GHz bands, there’s a new way to simplify and make life (or connecting your devices) that m

Apple cider, pumpkin spice and the smell of updates are in the air. Here’s what’s new:
• We’ve scared away even more bugs for an improved, fright-free experience.

Apple cider, pumpkin spice and the smell of updates are in the air. Here’s what’s new:
• We’ve scared away even more bugs for an improved, fright-free experience.

They say this is a busy time of year. We say, isn’t it always? Right now, we’re working on some exciting new features and enhancements we hope to bring your way soon. In the meantime:

• We’ve swept for bugs to make your experience even better. If y

Heading into the new year with a pocket full of confetti and some fresh updates. Here’s what’s new:

• We're working on our communication skills with clearer messaging and simplified steps. If you're ever confused by something in the app, let us k

Heading into the new year with a pocket full of confetti and some fresh updates. Here’s what’s new:
• We're working on our communication skills with clearer messaging and simplified steps. If you're ever confused by something in the app, let us know!

One good thing about long winter days? Long winter naps. Of course, we’ve been busy NOT napping but prepping some updates we’ll be introducing soon. In the meantime, here’s what’s new:

• We’ve continued to sweep for bugs, fixing them as quickly as

We’ve made a few updates and have a new addition, too. Here’s what’s new for you:
• Introducing the Xfinity Assistant. Ask a question and we’ll help you find an answer on the spot. You can even ask questions about your other Xfinity services and apps.<
Stay tuned for new features and enhancements coming soon. In the meantime, we've swept a few bugs to improve overall performance.

Improved performance, now and later.

We’ve swept bugs to reduce errors and prepare for upcoming enhancements. Stay tuned for more updates bringing exciting new features.

The Tips You Need, When You Need Them

Be on the lookout for our new, personalized “Just for You” section. When we have recommendations to improve your xFi experience, you’ll see them pop up here in real time.

Improved performance now, more features coming soon.

• We corrected bugs and errors to fine-tune the app for upcoming enhancements. Be sure to check for updates as exciting new features are on the way.
We’ve fixed issues some users experienced after update 2.11, specifically, higher-than-normal crash rates and requiring customers to sign in after being signed out unnecessarily.

Improved performance, now and later.

We’ve swept bugs to reduce errors and prepare for upcoming enhancements. Stay tuned for more updates bringing exciting new features.

Improved performance, now and later.

We’ve swept bugs to reduce errors and prepare for upcoming enhancements. Stay tuned for more updates bringing exciting new features.

Summer feature update

Manage your devices, and your time, easily this summer. We’ve added an Active Time limit feature that automatically pauses a device once the time limit is reached.

Pause WiFi access—automatically

Summer is here and so is our new feature. Our Active Time Limit feature allows you to automatically pause a profile’s WiFi access when it reaches the daily limit.

- A completely redesigned digital assistant takes the account and support conversation to a whole new level.
- Updated tips and additional checks to improve the Gateway activation experience.
- A new, streamlined way to provide us with your feedback

The leaves are starting to fall and we've dropped a new feature into this latest release.
Our new in-app purchase experience it easier than ever to get xFi Pods.

Improved performance, now and later.

We've swept bugs to reduce errors and prepare for upcoming enhancements. Stay tuned for more updates bringing exciting new features.

Introducing Downtime Schedules
• We now offer more flexible and granular scheduling capabilities for pausing WiFi access for profiles. You can now set up to 30 schedules and customize to any time and day of the week.

Updates to our Gateway and Pods Activations
• We've updated images and added new setup guidance to the Pods activation flow
• For customers upgrading or replacing a gateway, you'll have improved instructions in the activation flow

Improved performance, now and later.
We've swept bugs to reduce errors and prepare for upcoming enhancements. Stay tuned for more updates bringing exciting new features.
Your privacy is important. We've made it easier to learn about Xfinity's privacy practices in this latest release. Visit us at Xfinity.com/privacy.

xFi is now in Spanish.
The xFi app will automatically use your phone or tablet’s preferred language settings, which now includes Spanish. If you haven’t selected Spanish as your preferred language, the app will continue to be in English.
